# clearForcesAndTorques()

**Instance Method**

Clears all forces previously added to the physics body.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func clearForcesAndTorques()
```

## Adding and clearing forces

- **addForce(_:relativeTo:)**: Applies a force to the physics body at its center of mass.
- **addForce(_:at:relativeTo:)**: Applies a force to the physics body at the specified position.
- **addTorque(_:relativeTo:)**: Applies a torque to the physics body at its center of mass.
